TopicTitle: What Are The Wings For Sir?

Articles.Content:
Challenge is simple enough in theory.

Land a spaceplane on the mun using as close to conventional landing as possible. Take off from the mun and land on kerbin again.

Bonus points if you can do it in a single stage however I will allow you to place the plane on top of a stack of regular stages to leave kerbin if required. Post .craft files.

Good luck.

ONLY Parts allowed:

vanilla

NovaPunch

C7
You mean take off from kerbal and land on the moon, right?

You mean take off from kerbal and land on the moon, right?

Take off from kerbin, land moon, take off from moon and land on kerbin.

Dev\'s have confirmed planet is not called kerbal or kearth and is infact kerbin.

If anyone is going to do this type of challenge someone has to make a balanced C7 version with proper ratios.

Infact, I may just do that later.

Oh I\'ve got pictures all over the forum of me doing stuff like this.

I\'ll do it again just to show you.
